ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8.25 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and diced
1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained
1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced

cookingTips: Use canned or pre-cooked beets for quick assembly and minimal effort
Toss apples with dressing immediately to prevent browning
Granny Smith apples provide tartness that complements earthy beets
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I make this quick salad while keeping the apple from oxidizing?
